channel.title: Josephine County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Josephine County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-199 South at OR-260
item.description: US-199 South at OR-260 East to Merlin, Griffin Park, and Robertson Bridge.

item.title: US-199 South at OR-238
item.description: US-199 south at OR-238. Turn left on OR-238 for Murphy and Jacksonville. Continue south on US-199 for Rogue Community College, Cave Junction, and Crescent City (California).

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 55
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 55 - US-199/Redwood Highway/South Grants Pass/Crescent City (California).

item.title: US-199 South at OR-46
item.description: US-199 south at OR-46 east to Oregon Cavess National Monument.

item.title: US-199 South Approaching OR-46
item.description: US-199 south approaching OR-46 east in Cave Junction.

item.title: OR-238 South at US-199
item.description: OR-238 south at US-199. Turn right for US-199 south to Rogue Community College, Cave Junction, and Crescent City (CA). Continue south on OR-238 for Murphy and Jacksonville.

item.title: OR-99 South at US-199/OR-238
item.description: OR-99 south at US-199/OR-238 junction. Use left lane for OR-99 South/Rogue River Highway/Medford. Use middle lanes for OR-238/Murphy/Jacksonville. Use right lane for US-199 South/Rogue Community College/Cave Junction/Crescent City (CA).

item.title: OR-99 South at US-199/OR-238
item.description: OR-99 south approaching US-199 and OR-238. Use left lane to continue south on OR-99 and for OR-238 to Murphy (and US-199 North to Medford). Use right lane for US-199 south to Crescent City (California).

item.title: OR-99 South - Grants Pass
item.description: OR-99 south along 6th St. in Grants Pass.

item.title: OR-99 South - Grants Pass
item.description: OR-99 south (6th St.) in Grants Pass.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 58
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 58 - OR-99/To US-191/Redwood Highway/Grants Pass/City Center.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 58
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 58 - OR-99/To US-199/Redwood Highway/Grants Pass/City Center. The name of the highway is common on many interstate exit signs, especially in western Oregon.

item.title: I-5 South - Grants Pass Exits
item.description: Grants Pass - Next 2 Exits on I-5 south.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 61
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 61 - Merlin.

item.title: I-5 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-5 south. Distance to Grants Pass, Medford, and Ashland.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 66
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 66 - Hugo.

item.title: I-5 South - Sexton Mountain Summit
item.description: I-5 south at Sexton Mountain Summit - Elevation 1960 Feet. This summit is one a series of passes I-5 crosses between Canyonville and Grants Pass in the Klamath Mountains. The milepost is also attached to the main sign.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 71
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 71 - Sunny Valley.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 76
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 76 - Wolf Creek

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 78
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 78 - Speaker Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 78
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 78 - Speaker Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Entering Josephine County
item.description: Entering Josephine County on I-5 south. Many of the county line signs in southern Oregon (and Del Norte County California) contain the phrase We Honor Veterans.

item.title: End OR-46 West at US-199
item.description: End OR-46 west at US-199. Use US-199 east for Grants Pass. Use US-199 west for Crescent City.

item.title: US-199 South at OR-46
item.description: US-199 south at OR-46 east to Oregon Cavess National Monument.

item.title: US-199 South Approaching OR-46
item.description: US-199 south approaching OR-46 east.

item.title: US-199 South Approaching OR-46
item.description: US-199 south approaching OR-46 east to Oregon Caves National Monument

item.title: US-199 South at OR-238
item.description: US-199 south at E. Park St. Turn right on E. Park St. for the Grants Pass City Center. Turn left for access to OR-99 and Rogue River.

item.title: US-199 South At Park St.
item.description: US-199 south at E. Park St. Use Park St. south to connect to OR-99/Rogue River Highway.

item.title: US-199 South Approaching Park St.
item.description: US-199 south approaching E. Park St. Use Park St. south to connect to OR-99/Rogue River Highway.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 55
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 55- US-199/Redwood Highway/Ocean Beaches/Crescent City

item.title: For US-199 Truck Traffic - Use Exit 55
item.description: For truck traffic on US-199 South use Exit 55.

item.title: US-199 at OR-99/To I-5
item.description: US-199 north at OR-99/To I-5 to Portland and Medford.

item.title: US-199 North - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on US-199 north, at California border.

item.title: US-199 North at OR-46
item.description: US-199 north approaching OR-46.

item.title: US-199 North at OR-46/Oregon Caves
item.description: US-199 north at OR-46 to Oregon Caves.

item.title: US-199 North at OR-99/OR-238
item.description: US-199 north at OR-238 to Murphy/Jacksonville and OR-99 north to City Center.

item.title: US-199 Shield Signed as OR-199
item.description: Junction of US-199 across from Selma Post Office. US-199 shield incorrectly displayed with OR-199 shield.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 58
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 58 - OR-99/To US-191/Redwood Highway/Grants Pass/City Center.
